articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business, Vanessa Yurkevich
articles.title: Threat of rail strike rises as members of another union reject proposed labor deal - CNN
articles.description: Rank and file members of another railroad union have rejected a tentative labor deal, a move that further raises the odds that America's freight railroad workers will go on strike sometime next month.
articles.content: Rank and file members of another railroad union have rejected a tentative labor deal, a move that further raises the odds that Americas freight railroad workers will go on strike sometime next month.… [+6659 chars]

articles.author: Jiovanni Lieggi
articles.title: NASA scientists working on ground missions in preparation to put American boots back on the moon - Fox Business
articles.description: In preparation for future Artemis space mission's, NASA is training in northern Arizona using a prototype, pressurized moon rover that will be used on the moon and eventually Mars.
articles.content: FLAGSTAFF, Ariz. – NASA plans to launch the rocket ship Artemis I into space in just less than a month. It’s part of the plan to get Americans back on the moon and to explore more of space. It would … [+2633 chars]

articles.title: American singer Kelis shares video showing 2 women in Singapore touching her hair without permission - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Milkshake singer was sitting at a coffee shop when two women standing behind her started touching her braids and exclaiming about its length and whether it was real.
articles.content: It appeared that Kelis was initially trying to approach the interaction with good humour, even turning around to touch one of the womens hair in response, but the singer mostly looked bemused and res… [+1582 chars]
